title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 13 - released
description:
In this video we will have a look at the release notes of Sim Update 12 as well as the spot light event package which is now available for free containing the previous spotlight events. As you might have seen I have already recorded several videos which go through the detailed release notes of this update. If you didn't see them yet have a look at the video's listed below:

Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Boeing 787-10 - Using the EFB
https://youtu.be/8a_7ieQmHpA

Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS update - Boeing 747-8 - get's new functionality
https://youtu.be/D5uq3Q2L6Zw

Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS update - Boeing 747-8 - get's new functionality
https://youtu.be/D5uq3Q2L6Zw
